00064 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_RotationMatrix {
00065 
00066 protected:
00067 
00069   EGS_Float   rxx, rxy, rxz,
00070               ryx, ryy, ryz,
00071               rzx, rzy, rzz;
00072 
00073 public:
00074 
00076   EGS_RotationMatrix() {
00077       rxx=1; rxy=0; rxz=0;
00078       ryx=0; ryy=1; ryz=0;
00079       rzx=0; rzy=0; rzz=1;
00080   };
00081 
00082   //
00083   // hopefully no one will use this constructor
00084   // with a non-rotation matrix elements
00085   //
00087   EGS_RotationMatrix(EGS_Float xx, EGS_Float xy, EGS_Float xz,
00088                    EGS_Float yx, EGS_Float yy, EGS_Float yz,
00089                    EGS_Float zx, EGS_Float zy, EGS_Float zz) {
00090       rxx=xx; rxy=xy; rxz=xz;
00091       ryx=yx; ryy=yy; ryz=yz;
00092       rzx=zx; rzy=zy; rzz=zz;
00093   };
00094 
00096   EGS_RotationMatrix(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00097       rxx=m.rxx; rxy=m.rxy; rxz=m.rxz;
00098       ryx=m.ryx; ryy=m.ryy; ryz=m.ryz;
00099       rzx=m.rzx; rzy=m.rzy; rzz=m.rzz;
00100   };
00101 
00109   bool isRotation() const {
00110       EGS_Float d = det() - 1; EGS_RotationMatrix t((*this)*inverse());
00111       if( fabs(d) > 1e-4 || !t.isI() ) return false;
00112       return true;
00113   };
00114 
00115   // creates a matrix which, when applied to the vector v,
00116   // transforms it into a vector along the z-axis.
00117   // why z-axis?
00118   // well, it has to be one of the axis and in physics
00119   // things usually happen along the z-axis!
00127   EGS_RotationMatrix(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00128       EGS_Float sinz = v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y;
00129       EGS_Float norm = sinz + v.z*v.z;
00130       if( norm < 1e-15 ) egsFatal("EGS_RotationMatrix::EGS_RotationMatrix: \n"
00131               "  no construction from a zero vector possible!\n");
00132       norm = sqrt(norm);
00133       if( sinz > 1e-15 ) {
00134           sinz = sqrt(sinz);
00135           EGS_Float cphi = v.x/sinz; register EGS_Float sphi = v.y/sinz;
00136           EGS_Float cost = v.z/norm; register EGS_Float sint = -sinz/norm;
00137           *this = rotY(cost,sint)*rotZ(cphi,sphi);
00138       }
00139       else { // v is along the z-axis => matrix is the unit transformation
00140           rxx = 1; rxy = 0; rxz = 0;
00141           ryx = 0; ryy = 1; ryz = 0;
00142           rzx = 0; rzy = 0; rzz = 1;
00143       }
00144   };
00145 
00146   // R_x(alpha) * R_y(beta) * R_z(gamma)
00150   EGS_RotationMatrix(EGS_Float alpha, EGS_Float beta, EGS_Float gamma) {
00151       *this = rotX(alpha)*rotY(beta)*rotZ(gamma);
00152   };
00153 
00154   // R_z(phi) * R_x(theta)
00158   EGS_RotationMatrix(EGS_Float phi, EGS_Float theta) {
00159       *this = rotZ(phi)*rotX(theta);
00160   };
00161 
00163   EGS_RotationMatrix &operator=(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00164       rxx=m.rxx; rxy=m.rxy; rxz=m.rxz;
00165       ryx=m.ryx; ryy=m.ryy; ryz=m.ryz;
00166       rzx=m.rzx; rzy=m.rzy; rzz=m.rzz;
00167       return *this;
00168   };
00169 
00171   bool operator==(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00172     return
00173       ( (rxx == m.rxx) && (rxy == m.rxy) && (rxz == m.rxz) &&
00174         (ryx == m.ryx) && (ryy == m.ryy) && (ryz == m.ryz) &&
00175         (rzx == m.rxz) && (rzy == m.rzy) && (rzz == m.rzz) ) ? true : false;
00176   };
00177 
00180   bool isI() const {
00181       return ( rxx == 1 && rxy == 0 && rxz == 0 && ryx == 0 && ryy == 1 &&
00182                ryz == 0 && rzx == 0 && rzy == 0 && rzz == 1 );
00183   };
00184 
00186   EGS_Vector operator*(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00187       return EGS_Vector(rxx*v.x + rxy*v.y + rxz*v.z,
00188                         ryx*v.x + ryy*v.y + ryz*v.z,
00189                         rzx*v.x + rzy*v.y + rzz*v.z);
00190   };
00191 
00194   EGS_RotationMatrix operator*(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) const {
00195       return EGS_RotationMatrix(
00196               rxx*m.rxx+rxy*m.ryx+rxz*m.rzx, rxx*m.rxy+rxy*m.ryy+rxz*m.rzy,
00197               rxx*m.rxz+rxy*m.ryz+rxz*m.rzz,
00198               ryx*m.rxx+ryy*m.ryx+ryz*m.rzx, ryx*m.rxy+ryy*m.ryy+ryz*m.rzy,
00199               ryx*m.rxz+ryy*m.ryz+ryz*m.rzz,
00200               rzx*m.rxx+rzy*m.ryx+rzz*m.rzx, rzx*m.rxy+rzy*m.ryy+rzz*m.rzy,
00201               rzx*m.rxz+rzy*m.ryz+rzz*m.rzz);
00202   };
00203 
00204   // r *= m means r = r*m
00208   EGS_RotationMatrix &operator*=(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00209       return *this = operator * (m);
00210   };
00211 
00212   // r.multiply(m) means r = m*r;
00220   void multiply(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00221       *this = m.operator * (*this);
00222   };
00223 
00229   EGS_RotationMatrix inverse() const {
00230       return EGS_RotationMatrix(rxx,ryx,rzx,rxy,ryy,rzy,rxz,ryz,rzz);
00231   };
00232 
00234   EGS_RotationMatrix T() {
00235       return EGS_RotationMatrix(rxx,ryx,rzx,rxy,ryy,rzy,rxz,ryz,rzz);
00236   };
00237 
00239   EGS_RotationMatrix &invert() {
00240       return *this = inverse();
00241   };
00242 
00246   static EGS_RotationMatrix rotX(EGS_Float cphi,EGS_Float sphi) {
00247       return EGS_RotationMatrix(
00248               (EGS_Float)1,(EGS_Float)0,(EGS_Float)0,
00249               (EGS_Float)0,        cphi,        sphi,
00250               (EGS_Float)0,       -sphi,        cphi);
00251   };
00252 
00256   static EGS_RotationMatrix rotY(EGS_Float cphi,EGS_Float sphi) {
00257       return EGS_RotationMatrix(  cphi,  (EGS_Float)0,         sphi,
00258                           (EGS_Float)0,  (EGS_Float)1, (EGS_Float)0,
00259                                  -sphi,  (EGS_Float)0,         cphi);
00260   };
00261 
00265   static EGS_RotationMatrix rotZ(EGS_Float cphi,EGS_Float sphi) {
00266       return EGS_RotationMatrix(  cphi,        sphi,  (EGS_Float)0,
00267                                  -sphi,        cphi,  (EGS_Float)0,
00268                           (EGS_Float)0,(EGS_Float)0,  (EGS_Float)1);
00269   };
00270 
00272   static EGS_RotationMatrix rotX(EGS_Float phi) {
00273       return rotX(cos(phi),sin(phi));
00274   };
00275 
00277   static EGS_RotationMatrix rotY(EGS_Float phi) {
00278       return rotY(cos(phi),sin(phi));
00279   };
00280 
00282   static EGS_RotationMatrix rotZ(EGS_Float phi) {
00283       return rotZ(cos(phi),sin(phi));
00284   };
00285 
00289   static EGS_RotationMatrix rotV(EGS_Float phi, const EGS_Vector &v) {
00290       return rotV(cos(phi),sin(phi),v);
00291   };
00292 
00294   static EGS_RotationMatrix rotV(EGS_Float cphi, EGS_Float sphi,
00295                                  const EGS_Vector &v) {
00296       EGS_RotationMatrix m(v);
00297       return (m.inverse())*(rotZ(cphi,sphi))*(m);
00298   };
00299 
00301   EGS_Float det() const {
00302       return rxx*ryy*rzz + rxy*ryz*rzx + ryx*rzy*rxz -
00303              rxz*ryy*rzx - rxy*ryx*rzz - rzy*ryz*rxx;
00304   };
00305 
00309   friend EGS_Vector operator*(const EGS_Vector &v,
00310                               const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00311       return EGS_Vector(v.x*m.rxx+v.y*m.ryx+v.z*m.rzx,
00312                         v.x*m.rxy+v.y*m.ryy+v.z*m.rzy,
00313                         v.x*m.rxz+v.y*m.ryz+v.z*m.rzz);
00314   };
00315 
00320   friend EGS_Vector &operator*=(EGS_Vector &v, const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00321       v = v*m; return v;
00322   };
00323 
00324   inline EGS_Float xx() const { return rxx; };
00325   inline EGS_Float xy() const { return rxy; };
00326   inline EGS_Float xz() const { return rxz; };
00327   inline EGS_Float yx() const { return ryx; };
00328   inline EGS_Float yy() const { return ryy; };
00329   inline EGS_Float yz() const { return ryz; };
00330   inline EGS_Float zx() const { return rzx; };
00331   inline EGS_Float zy() const { return rzy; };
00332   inline EGS_Float zz() const { return rzz; };
00333 
00334 };
00335 
00346 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_AffineTransform {
00347 
00348 protected:
00349 
00350   EGS_RotationMatrix R;
00351   EGS_Vector         t;
00352   bool               has_t, has_R;
00353 
00354 public:
00355 
00357   EGS_AffineTransform() : R(),t(),has_t(false),has_R(false) {};
00358 
00360   EGS_AffineTransform(const EGS_AffineTransform &tr) :
00361       R(tr.R),t(tr.t),has_t(tr.has_t),has_R(tr.has_R) {};
00362 
00365   EGS_AffineTransform(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m, const EGS_Vector &v) :
00366           R(m),t(v) {
00367       if( t.length2() > 0  ) has_t = true; else has_t = false;
00368       if( R.isI() ) has_R = false; else has_R = true;
00369   };
00370 
00373   EGS_AffineTransform(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) : R(m),t() {
00374       has_t = false;
00375       if( R.isI() ) has_R = false; else has_R = true;
00376   };
00377 
00380   EGS_AffineTransform(const EGS_Vector &v) : R(),t(v) {
00381       has_R = false;
00382       if( t.length2() > 0  ) has_t = true; else has_t = false;
00383   };
00384 
00394   EGS_AffineTransform operator*(const EGS_AffineTransform &tr) const {
00395       return EGS_AffineTransform(R*tr.R,R*tr.t+t);
00396   };
00397 
00401   EGS_AffineTransform operator*(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) const {
00402       return EGS_AffineTransform(R*m,t);
00403   };
00404 
00410   EGS_AffineTransform &operator*=(const EGS_AffineTransform &tr) {
00411       return *this = operator * (tr);
00412   };
00413 
00419   EGS_AffineTransform &operator*=(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00420       return *this = operator * (m);
00421   };
00422 
00423   EGS_AffineTransform operator+(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00424       return EGS_AffineTransform(R,t+v);
00425   };
00426 
00427   EGS_AffineTransform &operator+=(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00428       t += v; return *this;
00429   };
00430 
00434   EGS_Vector operator*(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00435       return (R*v + t);
00436   };
00437 
00440   friend EGS_Vector operator*(const EGS_Vector &v,
00441                               const EGS_AffineTransform &tr) {
00442       return ((v-tr.t)*tr.R);
00443   };
00444 
00447   friend EGS_Vector &operator*=(EGS_Vector &v,
00448                                 const EGS_AffineTransform &tr) {
00449       v = v*tr; return v;
00450   };
00451 
00453   void transform(EGS_Vector &v) const {
00454       if( has_R ) v = R*v;
00455       if( has_t ) v += t;
00456   };
00457 
00459   void inverseTransform(EGS_Vector &v) const {
00460       if( has_t ) v -= t;
00461       if( has_R ) v *= R;
00462       //v -= t; v *= R;
00463   };
00464 
00466   EGS_AffineTransform inverse() const {
00467       EGS_Vector tmp; tmp -= t*R;
00468       return EGS_AffineTransform(R.inverse(),tmp);
00469   };
00470 
00472   void rotate(EGS_Vector &v) const { if( has_R ) v = R*v; };
00474   void rotateInverse(EGS_Vector &v) const { if( has_R ) v *= R; };
00476   void translate(EGS_Vector &v) const { v += t; };
00477 
00480   const EGS_Vector &getTranslation() const { return t; };
00483   const EGS_RotationMatrix &getRotation() const { return R; };
00484 
00487   bool isI() const { return (!has_R && !has_t); };
00488 
00491   bool hasTranslation() const { return has_t; };
00492 
00495   bool hasRotation() const { return has_R; };
00496 
00531   static EGS_AffineTransform* getTransformation(EGS_Input *inp);
00532 
00533 };
